description:
Day-Sunset-Night Cycle allows you to customize your wallpaper with dynamic pictures dedicated to a specific time of day. Images, states, and times are all customizable!

Properties:

Image Directory: Allows you to change the directory the wallpaper gets your pictures from. The directory must, at least, contain "day.jpg", "sunset.jpg", "night.jpg". If you only have a day and night picture, duplicate one and name it to sunset. 
You are also able to add sub-states, meaning you can have multiple pictures for each state of the day. The sub-state cycles according to the sub-state interval at the bottom. This allows you to cycle through multiple day pictures, for example. All you have to do is name the sub-state to "day2.jpg" according to the state and sub-state index. You do not have to number the first state, keep it at "day.jpg"

Day Hour Start: The hour day.jpg will display. 
Day Minute Start: The minute of the hour^ day.jpg will display

Sunset Hour Start: The hour sunset.jpg will display.
Sunset Minute Start: The minute of the hour^ sunset.jpg will display.

Night Hour Start: The hour night.jpg will display.
Night Minute Start: The minute of the hour^ night.jpg will display.

Day Sub-State Count: The amount of day sub-states you have in the directory. (e.g. Set this to "2" if you have a "day.jpg" and a "day2.jpg")
Sunset Sub-State Count: The amount of sunset sub-states you have in the directory
Night Sub-State Count: The amount of night sub-states you have in the directory

Sub-state Time Interval: The amount of time, in minutes, before the next sub-state, if any.

Default art by arsenixc on DeviantArt
title: Customizable Day-Sunset-Night Cycle
